body: Yea, I can readily get on board with moving it closer to this repo... even into this repo. But I'm just thinking one step at a time, at least to use it as-is to get the ECIPs straightened out, since this is how EIPs do it, so it's an established pattern, and if there's energy to restructure/replace/relocate the tool then that's great but doesn't seem like a dependency for the spirit of this PR to me.
